NoteInfo: Extra informational text displayed for the package
GlobalTagsInfo: Tags all players will see in the app
MusicCanBeCopyrighted: 포함된 음악에 저작권이 있을 수 있습니다
ConfirmEndSession: Are you sure you want to conclude your session?
CrDataLoadFailed: Failed to load data, try again later
ReuseData_Tip:
Re-uses the compatibility data from your last saved package for this one.
Hold Shift to also apply & continue
PleaseReviewTheStability: Please review the stability of this package before saving.
PleaseReviewPackageStatuses:
Please review the statuses of this package before saving.
Some have an invalid Status Type.
PleaseReviewPackageInteractions:
Please review the interactions of this package before saving.
Some have an invalid Interaction Type.
PleaseReviewPackageUsage: Please select a valid usage for this package.

Interaction_Alternative.One: '{1}' can be used as an alternative to '{0}'.
Interaction_Alternative.Plural: One of the following packages can be used as an alternative to '{0}'.

Interaction_SameFunctionality.Plural: '{0}' and the following packages have the same functionalities.

Interaction_IncompatibleWith.One: '{0}' and '{1}' are not compatible with each other.
Interaction_IncompatibleWith.Plural: '{0}' is not compatible with any of the following packages.

Interaction_CausesIssuesWith.One: '{0}' 는 '{1}' 와 함께 사용할 때 문제를 일으킬 수 있습니다.
Interaction_CausesIssuesWith.Plural: '{0}' 는 다음 모드와 함께 사용할 때 문제를 일으킬 수 있습니다.

Interaction_RequiredPackages.One: You're missing a required package for '{0}'.
Interaction_RequiredPackages.Plural: You're missing the following required packages for '{0}'.

Interaction_OptionalPackages.One: You're missing an optional package for '{0}'.
Interaction_OptionalPackages.Plural: You're missing the following optional packages for '{0}'.

Interaction_SucceededBy.Plural: '{0}' 는 다음 패키지 중 하나로 계승되었습니다.

Interaction_Identical:
이것들은 같은 패키지의 여러 버전들입니다.

이 중 하나만 선택해야 합니다.
Status_Succeeded:
'{0}' 는 '{1}' 로 계승되었습니다.

이미 '{1}' 를 사용하고 있기에 '{0}' 는 더 이상 필요하지 않습니다.
Status_Deprecated: '{0}' 는 더 이상 제작자에 의해 지원되지 않으며 사용되지 않습니다.

Status_Reupload.Zero: '{0}' is a re-upload of an original package.

Status_CausesIssues: '{0}' 는 게임에 문제를 일으킬 수 있습니다.

Status_SavesCantLoadWithoutIt.Zero: When creating a new save with '{0}' enabled, you will no longer be able to load that save if '{0}' is disabled.
Status_SavesCantLoadWithoutIt.One:
When creating a new save with '{0}' enabled, you will no longer be able to load that save if '{0}' is disabled.

Use '{1}' to recover your save if needed. Read its Workshop description for more info.

Status_TestVersion.Zero: This is a 'Test' version of the original mod. Be aware that updates to it might cause unexpected issues.
Status_TestVersion.One:
This is a 'Test' version of '{1}'.
Be aware that updates to it might cause unexpected issues.

Status_MissingDlc.One: You're missing the '{0}' DLC to use this package.
Status_MissingDlc.Plural:
This is a 'Test' version of '{1}'.
Be aware that updates to it might cause unexpected issues.

Status_DependencyMod: This is a dependency mod, but it does not seem like you are using any package that requires it.
Status_SourceCodeNotAvailable: 이 모드의 소스 코드를 확인할 수 없습니다. 모드 제작자를 신뢰하지 않는 이상 사용하지 않아야 합니다.
Status_MusicCanBeCopyrighted: The music inside this pack might be copyrighted. It's best not to use it while streaming.
Status_IncompleteDescription: The workshop description of this mod is too small. You should not use it unless you trust its author.
Stability_AssetNotReviewed:
이 에셋은 아직 리뷰되지 않았습니다.

에셋들은 일반적으로 안정적이지만 호환성 정보는 정확하지 않을 수 있습니다.
Stability_NotReviewed: This package has not been reviewed yet. The compatibility info may not be accurate.
Stability_NotEnoughInformation: There is not enough information to properly review this package.
Stability_HasIssues:
이 패키지는 문제를 일으킬 수 있습니다.
주의해서 사용하세요.
Stability_Broken:
이 패키지는 고장났습니다.
작동하지 않거나 게임을 고장내는 것으로 알려져 있습니다.
Stability_Incompatible:
이 패키지는 게임과 호환되지 않거나 게임을 고장냅니다.

이것은 바로 제거해야 합니다.
Stability_Local:
This package is a local version of its original mod '{0}'.

Local versions are usually used for testing purposes or in case you do not have Steam.

Check the package's links to look for updates to the mod.

Action_SubscribeToPackages.One: You should subscribe to the following package.
Action_SubscribeToPackages.Plural: You should subscribe to these packages.

Action_SelectOne.One: You should only use one between '{0}' and '{1}'.
Action_SelectOne.Plural: You should only use one between '{0}' and the following packages.

Action_UnsubscribeOther.Plural: You should unsubscribe from the following packages.

Action_ExcludeOther.Plural: You should exclude the following packages.

Action_Switch.Plural: 다음 패키지 중 하나로 바꿔야 합니다.

ApplyChangedBeforeExit:
You have un-saved changes.

Would you like to apply those changes before continuing?
AuthorRetired:
The author of {0}, {1}, has retired or has been inactive for a long time.

AuthorMalicious: The author of {0}, {1}, is known to be malicious and/or for including harmful content like viruses in their packages.
